content:
Hi Greg

Can you provide greater detail about the issue your experiencing.

What version of Thunderbird for Android is your phone running? What is the network error? What is displayed on any error messages? What steps can be followed to reproduce your issue?
creator: platform34

content:
Thunderbird 140.4.0esq is the desktop version.

A moderator should be able to move your ticket to the desktop forum where greater platform specific assistance is available.

In case you're asking about Thunderbird for Android v14, you can set "Inbox" as default from settings > account > folders > auto-select folder.
creator: platform34

content: Thanks for trying and answer. How do I find the desktop forum? /hans peter
creator: hans_peter
